actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the election as member of Committee on Science and Technology and election as member of Committee on Public Works and Transportation and on Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: Elects Members of the House of Representatives to the Committees on Science and Technology; Public Works and Transportation; and Government Operations.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the election as member of Committee on Science and Technology and election as member of Committee on Public Works and Transportation and on Committee on Government Operations.
